text: Rubén López (born 28 November 1990) is a Spanish gymnast. He competed in four events at the 2012 Summer Olympics. He also competed at five World Championships (2011, 2014, 2015, 2017 and 2018). He began gymnastic training at the age of seven, training at the Granollers Club. He was interested in the sport due to watching the performances of Li Xiaopeng at the 2000 Olympics. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Spain Category:Gymnasts at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts from Barcelona
title: Rubén López
